mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_user ( user_code, user_name, user_phone, user_image_path, user_account, user_password, user_id_card, is_delete, create_user, create_time, last_update_user, last_update_time, version, user_role ) values ( #{driverCode}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{userProfile}, #{userAccount}, #{userPassword}, #{userIdCard}, #{isDelete}, #{createUser}, now(), #{lastUpdateUser}, now(), 0, #{role} )

insert into t_sys_driver ( driver_code, province_code, city_code, area_code, is_delete, create_user, create_time, last_update_user, last_update_time, version ) values ( #{driverCode}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{isDelete}, #{createUser}, now(), #{lastUpdateUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select a.user_name as userName, a.user_phone as phone, a.user_image_path as userProfile, a.user_account as userAccount, a.user_password as userPassword, a.user_id_card as userIdCard, c1.area_name as provinceName, c2.area_name as cityName, c3.area_name as areaName from t_sys_user a, t_sys_driver b, t_sys_area c1, t_sys_area c2, t_sys_area c3 where b.is_delete = 0 and a.user_code = b.driver_code and b.province_code = c1.area_code and b.city_code = c2.area_code and b.area_code = c3.area_code and driver_code = #{driverCode}
mapper.update: update t_sys_user set user_password = #{userPassword}, user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{phone}, user_account = #{userAccount}, user_image_path = #{userProfile}, user_id_card = #{userIdCard}, version = version + 1, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser}, last_update_time = now() where user_code = #{driverCode}

update t_sys_driver set province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, version = version + 1, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser}, last_update_time = now() where driver_code = #{driverCode}
